summary: Change the size of your each of your moons to x0.5 - x0.6 - x0.7 - x0.8 - x0.9 - x1.1 - x1.2 - x1.3 - x1.4 - x1.5 - x2.0 - x2.5 - x3.0 their normal default
descriptionHtml:
Moon Size Tweek
akindain
11-22-11

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My Other Mods:
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5801\']1 Day Moon Phases[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=51\']20 Moons - Replacer Pack[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5358\']2012 Moon Replacers[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1037\']26 Moon Size Tweeks[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2438\']AVP[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=645\']Colored Logo[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2701\']Cybertron Moon[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5274\']No Secunda Moon[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=639\']Vibrant Dragons[/url]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*Please, ENDORSE if you enjoyed this mod. Thank You!

Change the size of your each of your moons to x0.5 - x0.6 - x0.7 - x0.8 - x0.9 - x1.1 - x1.2 - x1.3 - x1.4 - x1.5 - x2.0 - x2.5 - x3.0 their normal default

PLs give Kudos to [url=\"http://www.thenexusforums.com/index.php?/user/3181768-darukoni/\"]darukoni[/url] for making the video.

Warning - Bug
=============
May cause some moon replacers to distort

Install - Normal
=============
download and extract to your skyrim/data folder
select 2 of the 26 size tweeks from the data files on the launcher ( one for each moon ONLY )

Install - NMM
=============
download via NMM button 
activate mod 
select 2 of the 26 size tweeks ( one for each moon ONLY )
launch game

Un-Install
=========
Delete the 26 Esp files or deactivate then delete if using NMM
author: akindain
